channel.title: Help with castle wars
channel.description:
Ok can you guys help me fix this problem. When you die in castle wars you go back to varrok bank (like you do when you usualy die on my server.) Instead if you're in castle wars you go back to you're teams safe base area thingie.
Also it gives the player a hood when you start castle wars but is there anyway I can force players to always wear the hood? The first problem is more important though. Thanks.

item.title: Help with castle wars
item.dc:creator: @lord_of_gram lord of gram
item.description:
@lord_of_gram wrote:

will you plz post ur codes and stuff ?[quote=“Nintendo_G, post:1, topic:93632”]Ok can you guys help me fix this problem. When you die in castle wars you go back to varrok bank (like you do when you usualy die on my server.) Instead if you’re in castle wars you go back to you’re teams safe base area thingie.

Also it gives the player a hood when you start castle wars but is there anyway I can force players to always wear the hood? The first problem is more important though. Thanks.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with castle wars
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

[quote=".Kaboom, post:3, topic:93632"]Ive got the solution

Add this somewhere ( Not telling where)

if ((miHP <= 1) && (playerissara >= 1)) {
miHP += 100;
teleportToX = 2426;
teleportToY = 3074;

else if ((miHP <= 1) && (playeriszammy >= 1)) {
miHP += 100;
teleportToX = 2370;
teleportToY = 3131;[/quote]
oh come on please tell, I’m lazy I’ll figure it out later if you don’t tell me, but please tell.

Read full topic

teleportToY = 3131;
